title: APPARATUS FOR LAUNCHING PROJECTILES OR MISSILES FROM BARRELS, e.g. CANNONS  (smallarms F41C); LAUNCHERS FOR ROCKETS OR TORPEDOES; HARPOON GUNS  (functional features or details common to both smallarms and ordnance, mountings therefor F41A; projecting missiles without use of explosive or combustible propellant charge F41B)
definition_statement: This place covers: Projectile launchers per se, except for smallarms which are covered in  , i.e. cannons, mortars, medium/large calibre guns, artillery guns, ordnance. Launchers for self propelled missiles, i.e. rockets and torpedos. Gravity propelled missile launchers and missile launching apparatuses without barrels.

title: Launching apparatus for projecting projectiles or missiles from barrels, e.g. cannons  (F41F3/00 takes precedence); Harpoon guns
definition_statement: This place covers: Includes the projectile launching apparatuses with a barrel which is larger than smallarms. A barrel being defined as a gun tube with a closable breech at the proximal end. Includes mortars. Includes harpoon guns projecting harpoons with a pyrotechnic charge.

title: Rocket or torpedo launchers
definition_statement: This place covers: Launchers for rockets, including portable rocket tubes and vehicle/infrastructure mounted rocket pods or silos. Torpedo launchers from above (ship, land and air) and below the water surface.

title: for rockets
definition_statement: This place covers: Launchers for rockets, i.e. missiles including a warhead and a rocket propulsion system or self propelled missiles.

title: Means for imparting spin to the rocket before launching
Umbilical connecting means {(means for facilitating disengagement of electric line connector coupling parts in general H01R13/633)}
informative_references: Command link guidance using wiresWire guided self propelled missilesMeans for facilitating disengagement of electric line connector coupling parts

title: Underwater launching-apparatus
informative_references: Arrangements on submarines for launching missiles

title: for marine torpedoes {(F41A23/22 takes precedence)}
informative_references: Arrangements on submarines of torpedo launch installations

title: Launching-apparatus for gravity-propelled missiles or projectiles  (from aircraft B64D1/04)
definition_statement: This place covers: Includes devices for dropping warheads from a certain height only propelled by gravity, e.g. from land vehicles or buildings.

title: Launching-apparatus for projecting missiles or projectiles otherwise than from barrels, {e.g. using spigots} (F41F3/04 takes precedence; {centrifugal sling apparatus F41B3/04})
definition_statement: This place covers: Residual maingroup for projectile or missile launchers not covered by   -   and   -  .
